name: SFAS 2017 - Big Boss Cube
description:
My entry for the SFAS 2017 contest, the game is a small Bullet Hell Shooter, pickups spawn to help the player overwhelm the boss.

Pick ups:

-yellow energy cubes, every 10 energy cubes increases your bullet damage

-blue special energy cubes for special abilities

-green health cubes for some health back.

The boss will fire his own projectiles in a variety of patterns and fire lasers at you so you will have to be careful not to run in to a bomb while dodging them all! Can you beat the boss?

High scores are for winners! If you want to set a high score you have to beat the boss!

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Player movement

Q - Fire a nuke (Costs 3 special energy)

E - All damage you take heals you for that damage (costs 5 special energy)

* ALL SOUND EFFECTS WERE GENERATED FROM:

www.sfbgames.com/chiptone/

* MUSIC IS ROYALTY FREE MUSIC FROM:

https://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/power-up/
